attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded my phone started acting up it froze and rebooted and when I try to delete it doesn’t allow me to. It’s like this application is some how now dictating how I can use my phone. Trigger warning, I regret ever downloading it, as soon as you open it there’s a jump scare. I’m just going to throw my whole phone away now.
attributes.title: My phone caught Corona

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app with the intention of supporting my amazing president Tramp, however, the minute I opened the app, my skin began to itch profusely. I had developed eczema. I’ve been struggling with eczema ever since that day. My family and I have also been experiencing rashes that we also think is from this app. This app needs to be deleted immediately before it harms others.
attributes.title: Gave me Eczema

attributes.review: This app was honestly trash when I opened it me phone screen got FLOODED with a bunch of PORN🤢🤢🤢 I was horrified and the fact that my FIVE YEAR OLD DAUGHTER was right next to me and everything was terrifying. It made me sad that she started crying after that. After I open the app I got a horrible virus and I could no longer use my phone. I now just got a new phone. PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT IS VERY HORRIBLE🤢🤢🤢💕😃😼🙈🧚🏾‍♂️
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the first thing I saw when I opened it was a heavily distorted picture of a old man rolled in Cheeto dust. My little sister peered over my shoulder and instantly jumped out my car into the highway just like bird box. Soon after when I got home I found all of my cats were floating in my pool. I’m suing because now I don’t have my sister and all 69 of my cats

What a shame!
attributes.title: Honestly really disappointed

attributes.review: first i opened the app to see a picture of naked donald trump getting spray tanned 🤮. then as i continued on i saw many racist comments and words pointed at the people of color on the app. also i saw homophobia ON EVERY PAGE of this app. now i would very much like this app to be taken off of the app store for foul play, graphic images, homophobia, racism, and just being strait up stupid.
attributes.title: horrifying and graphic

attributes.review: Man what can I say as soon as I open this app I see some big body HOF fridge eater getting a tan and I believe his name was Donald Duck and I was like wow is this a cheese puff or a actual human then I see a no existent left ball when he got out of there and I deleted the app but after months of almost never sleeping I finally got to cope with this trauma of see a small ball and now I am happy 😔
attributes.title: Never again ftb 😔
